department: Works and Services of the Government (TPSGC)
short_summary: Stanchions in accordance with Annex A. This procurement is conditionally limited to Canadian goods.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2022-10-03 at 2 p.m. EST. All bids submitted after 2 p.m. EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
